articles.description: LSG registered  big 56 run win over PBKS in IPL 2023, after they posted 257 in the first innings. But does it rank among the top 10 team total in IPL 2023? We answer this exact question here.
articles.content: In IPL 2013, Chris Gayle smashed 175, the highest individual score in IPL history to fire RCB to 265/4 against PWI, the highest team total in IPL history.

articles.description: The owner of the Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) cricket team and Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan recently contacted cricketer Rinku Singh to congratulate him on his outstanding performance in a match promised him to gift 'THIS.'

articles.title: Jerez ace Quartararo's dire form lays Yamaha misery bare - The Race
articles.description: Lacking single-lap performance and "not good" on pace, Fabio Quartararo sounds resigned to a tough weekend at a track he clearly loves.
articles.content:
MotoGP 2021 world champion Fabio Quartararo says that itll be “impossible” to add to his impressive record at Jerez this weekend.
